mapper.insert: replace into t_erp_inventory_his_day(shopid,warehouseid,materialid,byday,inbound,fulfillable,outbound,operator,opttime) SELECT* FROM ( select iv.shopid,iv.warehouseid,iv.materialid,#{byday,jdbcType=CHAR} `byday` , sum(case when POSITION('inbound' IN iv.`status` ) then iv.quantity else 0 end ) inbound, sum(case when (iv.`status`='fulfillable') then iv.quantity else 0 end) fulfillable, sum(case when POSITION('outbound' IN iv.`status`) then iv.quantity else 0 end) outbound, MAX(iv.operator) operator, MAX(iv.opttime) opttime FROM ( SELECT his.* FROM t_erp_inventory_his his INNER JOIN ( SELECT h.shopid,h.warehouseid,h.materialid,h.`status`,max(modifyday) modifyday FROM t_erp_inventory_his h WHERE h.modifyday<=#{endday,jdbcType=CHAR} and h.modifyday>date_sub(now(),interval 2 year) GROUP BY h.shopid,h.warehouseid,h.materialid,h.`status` ) v on v.shopid=his.shopid and v.warehouseid=his.warehouseid AND v.materialid=his.materialid and v.`status`=his.`status` AND v.modifyday=his.modifyday ) iv group by iv.shopid,iv.warehouseid,iv.materialid ) hisv WHERE hisv.inbound>0 or hisv.fulfillable>0 or hisv.outbound>0
